005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.validation;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IResourceLocation;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.IConstraint.Level;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
011
012import org.xml.sax.ErrorHandler;
013import org.xml.sax.SAXException;
014import org.xml.sax.SAXParseException;
015
016import java.io.IOException;
017import java.io.InputStream;
018import java.net.URI;
019import java.util.Collections;
020import java.util.LinkedList;
021import java.util.List;
022
023import javax.xml.XMLConstants;
024import javax.xml.transform.Source;
025import javax.xml.transform.stream.StreamSource;
026import javax.xml.validation.Schema;
027import javax.xml.validation.SchemaFactory;
028import javax.xml.validation.Validator;
029
030import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
031
032/**
033 * Supports validating an XML resource using an XML schema.
034 */
035public class XmlSchemaContentValidator
036    extends AbstractContentValidator {
037  private final Schema schema;
038
039  @SuppressWarnings("null")
040  @NonNull
041  private static Schema toSchema(@NonNull List<? extends Source> schemaSources) throws SAXException {
042    SchemaFactory schemafactory = SchemaFactory.newInstance(XMLConstants.W3C_XML_SCHEMA_NS_URI);
043    // schemafactory.setResourceResolver(new ClasspathResourceResolver());
044    Schema retval;
045    if (schemaSources.isEmpty()) {
046      retval = schemafactory.newSchema();
047    } else {
048      retval = schemafactory.newSchema(schemaSources.toArray(new Source[0]));
049    }
050
051    // TODO verify source input streams are closed
052    return retval;
053  }
054
055  /**
056   * Construct a new XML schema validator using the provided XML schema sources.
057   *
058   * @param schemaSources
059   *          the XML schemas to use for validation
060   * @throws SAXException
061   *           if an error occurred while parsing the provided XML schemas
062   */
063  public XmlSchemaContentValidator(@NonNull List<? extends Source> schemaSources) throws SAXException {
064    this(toSchema(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(schemaSources, "schemaSources")));
065  }
066
067  /**
068   * Construct a new XML schema validator using the provided pre-parsed XML
069   * schema(s).
070   *
071   * @param schema
072   *          the pre-parsed XML schema(s) to use for validation
073   */
074  protected XmlSchemaContentValidator(@NonNull Schema schema) {
075    this.schema = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(schema, "schema");
076  }
077
078  private Schema getSchema() {
079    return schema;
080  }
081
082  @Override
083  public IValidationResult validate(InputStream is, URI documentUri) throws IOException {
084    Source xmlSource = new StreamSource(is, documentUri.toASCIIString());
085
086    Validator validator = getSchema().newValidator();
087    XmlValidationErrorHandler errorHandler = new XmlValidationErrorHandler(documentUri);
088    validator.setErrorHandler(errorHandler);
089    try {
090      validator.validate(xmlSource);
091    } catch (SAXException ex) {
092      throw new IOException(String.format("Unexpected failure during validation of '%s'", documentUri), ex);
093    }
094    return errorHandler;
095  }
096
097  /**
098   * Records an identified individual validation result found during XML schema
099   * validation.
100   */
101  public static class XmlValidationFinding implements IValidationFinding, IResourceLocation {
102    @NonNull
103    private final URI documentUri;
104    @NonNull
105    private final SAXParseException exception;
106    @NonNull
107    private final Level severity;
108
109    /**
110     * Construct a new XML schema validation finding, which represents an issue
111     * identified during XML schema validation.
112     *
113     * @param severity
114     *          the finding significance
115     * @param exception
116     *          the XML schema validation exception generated during schema
117     *          validation representing the issue
118     * @param resourceUri
119     *          the resource the issue was found in
120     */
121    public XmlValidationFinding(
122        @NonNull Level severity,
123        @NonNull SAXParseException exception,
124        @NonNull URI resourceUri) {
125      this.severity = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(severity, "severity");
126      this.exception = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(exception, "exception");
127      this.documentUri = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(resourceUri, "documentUri");
128    }
129
130    @Override
131    public String getIdentifier() {
132      // always null
133      return null;
134    }
135
136    @Override
137    public Kind getKind() {
138      return Level.WARNING.equals(getSeverity()) ? Kind.PASS : Kind.FAIL;
139    }
140
141    @Override
142    public Level getSeverity() {
143      return severity;
144    }
145
146    @SuppressWarnings("null")
147    @Override
148    public URI getDocumentUri() {
149      String systemId = getCause().getSystemId();
150      return systemId == null ? documentUri : URI.create(systemId);
151    }
152
153    @Override
154    public int getLine() {
155      return getCause().getLineNumber();
156    }
157
158    @Override
159    public int getColumn() {
160      return getCause().getColumnNumber();
161    }
162
163    @Override
164    public long getCharOffset() {
165      // not known
166      return -1;
167    }
168
169    @Override
170    public long getByteOffset() {
171      // not known
172      return -1;
173    }
174
175    @Override
176    public IResourceLocation getLocation() {
177      // TODO Auto-generated method stub
178      return this;
179    }
180
181    @Override
182    public String getPathKind() {
183      // not known
184      return null;
185    }
186
187    @Override
188    public String getPath() {
189      // not known
190      return null;
191    }
192
193    @SuppressWarnings("null")
194    @Override
195    public String getMessage() {
196      return getCause().getLocalizedMessage();
197    }
198
199    @NonNull
200    @Override
201    public SAXParseException getCause() {
202      return exception;
203    }
204  }
205
206  private static class XmlValidationErrorHandler implements ErrorHandler, IValidationResult {
207    @NonNull
208    private final URI documentUri;
209    @NonNull
210    private final List<XmlValidationFinding> findings = new LinkedList<>();
211    @NonNull
212    private Level highestSeverity = Level.INFORMATIONAL;
213
214    public XmlValidationErrorHandler(@NonNull URI documentUri) {
215      this.documentUri = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(documentUri, "documentUri");
216    }
217
218    @NonNull
219    public URI getDocumentUri() {
220      return documentUri;
221    }
222
223    private void adjustHighestSeverity(@NonNull Level severity) {
224      if (highestSeverity.ordinal() < severity.ordinal()) {
225        highestSeverity = severity;
226      }
227    }
228
229    @SuppressWarnings("null")
230    @Override
231    public void warning(SAXParseException ex) throws SAXException {
232      findings.add(new XmlValidationFinding(Level.WARNING, ex, getDocumentUri()));
233      adjustHighestSeverity(Level.WARNING);
234    }
235
236    @SuppressWarnings("null")
237    @Override
238    public void error(SAXParseException ex) throws SAXException {
239      findings.add(new XmlValidationFinding(Level.ERROR, ex, getDocumentUri()));
240      adjustHighestSeverity(Level.ERROR);
241    }
242
243    @SuppressWarnings("null")
244    @Override
245    public void fatalError(SAXParseException ex) throws SAXException {
246      findings.add(new XmlValidationFinding(Level.CRITICAL, ex, getDocumentUri()));
247      adjustHighestSeverity(Level.CRITICAL);
248    }
249
250    @SuppressWarnings("null")
251    @Override
252    @NonNull
253    public List<XmlValidationFinding> getFindings() {
254      return Collections.unmodifiableList(findings);
255    }
256
257    @Override
258    public Level getHighestSeverity() {
259      return highestSeverity;
260    }
261  }
262}
